name: Find Drive Belts
description: Obtain 3 makeshift drive belts in exchange for credit with the loggers.

dialogue.describe: I need three makeshift drive belts.
dialogue.offer: Some of our machinery recieved some damage before <the_cataclysm>, and we were waiting on some replacement parts.  Now that we don't have them, we need replacements.  Get us three drive belts, and I'll give you some credit with us.
dialogue.advice: A good replacement can be made from a belt and some duct tape, nothing difficult.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Wonderful! Thanks <name_g>, we'll be fine for a long while from now.
dialogue.success_lie: Where are they? I don't believe you.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess we'll have to find someone else to do it.

name: Get 1,000 Nails
description: Obtain 1,000 nails in exchange for credit with the loggers.

dialogue.offer: Along with those drive belts, we were waiting for some nails for structural repairs.  Due to <the_cataclysm>, we never recieved them.  So, I need you to get us 1,000 nails. We'll pay you fairly.
dialogue.advice: Taking apart some furniture in town should get what you need.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Our warehouse was about to fall apart.  These will be extremely helpful to us.
dialogue.success_lie: Where are they? I don't believe you.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess we'll have to find someone else to do it.

name: Get 6,800 Nails
description: Obtain 6,800 nails in exchange for credit with the loggers.

dialogue.offer: While fairly sturdy, the metal fence around this place won't hold out for long.  So, we've decided to replace it with a wall.  However, the nails we had were used to repair our existing structures, and they weren't nearly enough.  After some calculations, we need 6,800 nails to do it.  That may seem like a lot, but we're willing to give you a ton of credit for it.
dialogue.advice: Dismantling a building somewhere in town could get you wnat you need.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: That's absolutely amazing!  I can't thank you enough for this!
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate. I guess we'll have to find someone else to do it.

name: Find 6 Blankets
description: Obtain 6 blankets in exchange for credit with the loggers.

dialogue.offer: Now that we should be safe from harm, I decided to start adding a few things to this place.  Right now, we don't have anywhere to comfortably sleep, so we're building a small sleeping quarter.  If you could get us 6 blankets, we could finish our project.
dialogue.advice: A hotel in town should have lots of them.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.success: Thanks! Feel free to sleep there if you want.
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess we'll have to find someone else to do it.

name: Establish A Trade Route
description: Establish trade relations between the loggers and a refugee center, and bring back a writ of the agreement.

dialogue.offer: While some of us were out scavenging, we came across an old adress for an evac center; and from what we found out, there should be some people there.  I want you to go over there, see whoever runs the joint and negotiate a deal with them for refined lumber.  This will be invaluble to our survival.
dialogue.advice: It should be pretty simple making the deal, but I'd recommend taking a car over there myself.
dialogue.accepted: I'll be here when you get back.  Good luck!
dialogue.rejected: Please? This is really important to us.
dialogue.inquire: What did they say about it?
dialogue.success: Thank you!  We're set for life on this one!
dialogue.failure: That's unfortunate.  I guess we'll have to find someone else to trade with.
